original_text: The first animal seemed like a lion, but it had the wings of an eagle. As I watched, someone pulled its wings off. They lifted it up and it stood on two feet like a man. They gave a man's mind to it.
korean_text: 첫째는 사자와 같은데 독수리의 날개가 있더니 내가 보는 중에 그 날개가 뽑혔고 또 땅에서 들려서 사람처럼 두 발로 서게 함을 받았으며 또 사람의 마음을 받았더라 또 보니

sentences.original_text: The first animal seemed like a lion
but it had the wings of an eagle
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 독수리의 날개를 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and it stood on two feet like a man
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것은 사람처럼 두 발로 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: They gave a man's mind to it
